issue.summary: Hsa14- DHRS4 region problem
issue.status_text: 23-JAN-13: RP11-91H8 has failed in sequencing RP11-610H12 has failed in sequencing 17-DEC-14: RP11-76P17 has entered the sequencing pipeline
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion between AL136419.3 and AL136295.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Based on Optical map data from cell line #10860 AL589743 looks to be in the wrong orientation
issue.status_text: The following clones have been selected to try and resolve this region: 09-APR-14: RP11-474D5 has been cancelled 17-DEC-14: RP11-254K6 has entered the sequencing pipeline 06-SEP-14: RP11-1113K15 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for RP11-1113K15: FO681504 28-FEB-15: RP11-244H18 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 17-DEC-14: RP11-146E13 has entered the sequencing pipeline Accession for RP11-244H18: FO704662 Accession for RP11-474D5: FO704799 RP11-254K6 has been cancelled
issue.description: Based on Optical map data from cell line #10860 AL589743 looks to be in the wrong orientation
issue.resolution_text: The orientation of AL589743 was corrected so that it reflects the Haplotype shown in the optical map data (cell line 10860).

issue.summary: Assignment of AL671532 from PMID: 18477386 to chr. Un for GRCh37
issue.status_text: AL671532 has been placed on Chr14_UNLOCALIZED. At this time there is no information that can place this component on the main Chr14 TPF
issue.description: AL671532 has been placed on Chr. Un b/c it has not been unambiguously localized to a specific chromosome.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: 1bp deletion in AL049871.4 affects GPHB5 gene translation
issue.description: Deletion of a single C in AL049871.4 is in the first coding exon of gene GPHB5 and therefore affects the translation.
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint has been updated to start showing sequence at the begining of AL118555 which contains the missing base observed in the reference clone AL049871

issue.summary: Unlocalized scaffold assigned to chromosome 4 may belong elsewhere
issue.status_text: Unlocalized scaffold consisting of AC145212.1 has been moved onto Chr14_UNLOCALIZED TPF as a result of admixture mapping, currently there is no evidence of a good placement for this scaffold on the main Chr 14 TPF.
issue.description: An unlocalized scaffold associated with chromosome 4 may actually map elsewhere in the genome, however there is conflicting evidence about the exact location.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap between CR383659.1 and the centromere
issue.description: There is a gap between CR383659.1 and the centromere
issue.resolution_text: There is ~49kb of ALR/Alpha centromeric repeat on the end of CR383659.1. The type 3 gap that existed on the TPF between CR383659.1 and the centromere has been removed.

issue.summary: There is a gap between CR383656.1 and AL929601.4
issue.status_text: The following clones have been selected to extend into the gap: 09-APR-14: RP11-474D5 has been cancelled 06-SEP-14: RP11-1113K15 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for RP11-1113K15: FO681504 Accession for RP11-474D5: FO704799 RP11-1112K21 has been selected for sequencing
issue.description: There is a gap between CR383656.1 and AL929601.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap between AL512624.5 and AL512310.4
issue.status_text: The following clone has been selected to extend into the gap: 17-DEC-14: RP11-254K6 has entered the sequencing pipeline RP11-254K6 has been cancelled
issue.description: There is a gap between AL512624.5 and AL512310.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 14 CH17 Pathway - IGH Region
issue.description: Several clones have been sequenced that align from AL122127-AB019437 in the IGH region of chromosome 14 mentioned in HG-3. These clones form a contiguous single haplotype pathway that may be used to improve the reference in this region.
issue.resolution_text: A portion of the IGH region previously represented in GRCh37 NC_000014.8 from AB019441.1 to AB019437.1 has been replaced with clones from the CH17 single haplotype library. This has been released as part of GRC.p11. The patch contig name is HG1592_PATCH.

issue.summary: There is a high variation join between AL929601.4 and AL589182.4
issue.description: There is a high variation join between AL929601.4 and AL589182.4
issue.resolution_text: AL929601.4 (RP11-244H18) was found to contain a poor quality, unfinished region which resulted in a high variation join between itself and AL589182.4. New data was produced for clone RP11-244H18, this now has a finished assembly with accession FO704662.5. FO704662.5 has replaced AL929601.4 on the tpf, thereby resolving the high variation join issue.

issue.summary: Former 1q21 pericentromeric sequence BX004987.9 needs to be localized
issue.status_text: It has not been possible to further localize BX004987.9 on Chr14 so this issue will be stalled.
issue.description: Former 1q21 pericentromeric sequence BX004987.9 needs to be localized
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Admixture mapping of decoy sequence
issue.status_text: It has not been possible to further localize AC138774.4 on Chr14 so this issue will be stalled.
issue.description: admixture mapping places clone RP11-1320P3 (AC138774.4) on to chr14p. As there is no alignment to anything in GRCh37 it should be placed on the Chr14_UNLOCALIZED TPF.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Indel rs11324184, affecting the TRAJ36 gene, is reported by 1000genomes as never occurring, confirmed by additional analyses.
issue.description: Indel rs11324184 is reported by 1000genomes phase1 under strict accessibility criteria as never occurring and is also confirmed by Jared Simpson's 61mer analysis. It results in a frameshift in the TRAJ36 gene, possibly leading to truncation.
issue.resolution_text: Indel rs11324184, affecting the TRAJ36 gene, was reported by the 1KG data as never occurring, evidence suggested the SNP was due to a sequencing error in the reference component AE000662.1 (This was later replaced by AE000521.1 which was an amalgamation of several clones including AE000662.1). The error has been corrected by the retiling of the region in CH17. The new tilepath is has been incorporated into GRCh38.

issue.summary: Update to short-arm gap length on chr. 14 TPF
issue.description: GRC housekeeping update to restore short-arm length to GRCh37 value
issue.resolution_text: Short-arm length for chr. 14 TPF has been restored to the GRC37 value of 15990000.

issue.summary: AL162471.3 is redundant under AL159140.4 and AL121694.4
issue.description: AL162471.3 is redundant under AL159140.4 and AL121694.4
issue.resolution_text: AL162471.3 is redundant under AL159140.4 and AL121694.4 and has been removed from the TPF. A certificate has been created and approved for the short/cloning site overlap that exists between AL159140.4 and AL121694.4.

issue.summary: There are alignment issues between AL133313.2 and AL132986.4
issue.description: There are alignment issues between AL133313.2 and AL132986.4. The problem is a result of AL133313.2 containing unfinished sequence.
issue.resolution_text: This issue has now been resolved by adjusting the switch points between AL133313.2 and AL132986.4. As a result of the updated switch points for the pair, part of the region previously represented by AL133313.2 in the reference, is now represented by AL132986.4.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC207713.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC207713.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between AL358338.3 and AL110505.5 has been curated to capture the sequence from AC207713.3 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234135.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC234135.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: The decoy sequence AC234135.3:11620-29390 has been captured for GRCh38 in overlapping components AC245369 (CH17-212P11)and AC245023 (CH17-314I7).

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC215700.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC215700.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC215700.3 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence from AC207871.4 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC242209.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: Component AC242209.3 has been placed on Chr14_UNLOCALIZED TPF in order to capture sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC145616.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: Component AC145616.2 has been placed on Chr14_UNLOCALIZED TPF in order to capture sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC233755.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: In order to capture sequence from AC233755.2 present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37 Reference assembly, this component has been placed onto the chr. 14 unlocalized TPF.

issue.summary: SERPINA2P (Gene ID: 390502) - Allele 'T' within the Reference genome alters the initiation codon for SERPINA2P
issue.description: Initiation codon for the gene SERPINA2P disrupted in the Reference
issue.resolution_text: The addition of 1K-genomes decoy sequence AC235087.2 to the Chr 14 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF resolves this issue.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL132986.4
issue.status_text: Checking OM's and RP11 WGS alignments to GRCh37 for region
issue.description: Analysis of GU267234.1 and GU269078.1 along with alignment of HuRef chr. 14, suggest there may be ~2,147 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL132986.4. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL161670.4
issue.description: Analysis of GU266970.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 14, suggest there may be ~6,705 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL161670.4. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL355099.5
issue.description: Analysis of GU268367.1, GU267591.1 and GU267399.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 14, suggest there may be ~6,844 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL355099.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL160192.3
issue.description: Analysis of GU267679.1 and GU268104.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 14, suggest there may be ~2,988 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL160192.3. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL162872.4
issue.description: Analysis of GU269051.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 14, suggest there may be ~1,504 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL162872.4. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL132709.5
issue.description: Analysis of GU266948.1 and GU267872.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 14, suggest there may be ~2,160 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL132709.5. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AL133313.2 contains sequence identified as decoy that was not captured for GRCh38
issue.description: Analysis of the decoy sequence identifies a region of AL133313.2 where short read data aligns but that is not currently represented in the reference. This region should be captured for GRCh39.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: IGH representations in IGH RefSeqGene not found in GRCh38 and its alt loci
issue.status_text: Investigating issue. Will liaise with HAVANA for their review of region.
issue.description: The GRCh38 assembly lacks representation for 3 IGH genes that are found in the RefSeqGene representation of this region (NG_001019.5): IGHV2-10 (GeneID 28456), IGHV3-9 (GeneID 28451) and IGHV1-8 (GeneID 28472).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL132712.4
issue.description: Investigating issue to check for other sequences that support or dispute reference.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: ABC10-44748900N6 (AC244463.2): IgH variant sequence?
issue.description: Fosmid clone AC244463.2 (ABC10-44748900N6) may represent an IgH variant that should be represented in the reference assembly. In GRCh37, it aligns to NC_000014.8: 106543367-106573243 in a region encompassing IGHV3-9 and IGHV2-10. The entire IgH region was updated in GRCh38 to a single haplotype representation from CHM1, but this haplotype lacks representation for the sequence in this fosmid (see also HG-2332). The GRC is looking at providing an alternate locus representation to capture this sequence.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Is the IGH (etc.) locus really complete?
issue.description: Are IG and T-cell assembled regions using sequence from a single library (for each region)?
issue.resolution_text: Issues associated with the chr. 14 IGH region are being handled in HG-3.

issue.summary: The reference genome represents an alternate allele of IFI27 (GeneID: 3429).
issue.description: The reference genome represents an alternate allele of IFI27 (GeneID: 3429).
issue.resolution_text: WGS mini contig KF573698.1, derived from data from the 1000 Genomes Project, has been incorporated into the Chr14 TPF in order to update the reference genome GRCh38 to represent the major allele for rs3833507 and the IF127 gene.

issue.summary: Hsa14-IGH region problem
issue.status_text: Attempts are being made to retile this region in CH17 only. CH17 deleted over part of this region so alternatives have been selected: 26-JUL-14: ABC12-47946000O13 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 10-JUN-13: ABC12-49057200M11 has been cancelled ABC12-49231300H15 NOT AVAILABLE ABC12-49221900K10 has been selected for sequencing (alternative to ABC12-49231300H15) Accession for ABC12-47946000O13: FO704555 17-DEC-14: ABC12-49221900K10 has entered the sequencing pipeline ABC12-49221900K10 contigs have been ordered and orientated Accession for ABC12-49221900K10: LO016974
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion between AL928769.1and AB019437.1
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: GeneID: 9985 (REC8), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_005132.2 (REC8) and the reference genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: WGS mini contig KF459601.1, derived from data from the 1000 Genomes Project has been incorporated into the Chr14 TPF in order to update the reference genome GRCh38 to represent the major allele for rs55729421.

issue.summary: GeneID: 79697 (C14orf169), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_024644.2 (C14orf169) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: There was a sequencing error in AC005280.3 (rs33983045) that affected C14orf169. The error has now been corrected and the accession has been updated to AC005280.5. There is now 100% identity between AC005280.5 and NM_024644.3 (updated version of NM_024644.2).

issue.summary: AL589743.4 and AL589182.4 have 2 alignments in opposing orientation
issue.description: AL589743.4 and AL589182.4 have 2 alignments in opposing orientation, a situation that disrupts contig building
issue.resolution_text: Alignment selected for contig building. Orientation has been found to be incorrect and is being worked on in HG-1060

issue.summary: Missing alignment/certification for AB019441.1 and AB019440.1 join precludes contig building
issue.description: Missing alignment/certification for AB019441.1 and AB019440.1 join precludes contig building
issue.resolution_text: Certificate submitted for blunt join.

issue.summary: AL160471.5 has a 3bp insertion with respect to AL352982.3
issue.description: AL160471.5 has a 3bp insertion with respect to AL352982.3
issue.resolution_text: the 3bp insertion was excluded from the reference

issue.summary: AL356807.3 has a small insertion relative to AL390802.2
issue.description: AL356807.3 has a small insertion relative to AL390802.2
issue.resolution_text: Swithcpoints were altered from the legacy, and the sequnce kept in for the build

issue.summary: Chr. 14 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between AB019437.1 and the telomere
issue.resolution_text: Duplicated of HG-762

issue.summary: Chr. 14 Gap Problem
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AB019437.1 and the telomere
issue.resolution_text: As a result of this region being retiled in CH17 the flanking component changed from AB019437.1 to AC245023, with AB019437.1 now being placed on an alternate locus. The gap between AC245023 and the telomere was then closed with the addition of FO704700 to the tilepath. The Addition of FO704700 to the tilepath has been captured for GRCh38.p2.

issue.summary: AE000658-AE000662 have been replaced in Genbank by AE000521.1, but the TPF doesn't reflect this
issue.description: 5 clones (AE000658, AE000659, AE000660, AE000661, AE000662) have been replaced/updated to a single accession (AE000521). The TPF currently doesn't reflect this
issue.resolution_text: TPF has been updated to reflect the updated accession

issue.summary: GPR33 gene is polymorphic pseudogene
issue.description: GRCh37 contains the inactive (but more common) allele for GPR33.
issue.resolution_text: A mini-contig (KF459682.2) has been created using data from the 1000 genomes project, KF459682.2 updates rs17097921 in order that the coding allele is now represeted at this position in the reference genome.

issue.summary: AC005857 is currently called RP4-809F18, but this name belongs to AC007368 (see HG-101). Submitters have confirmed this but can't find out the correct name for AC005857.
issue.description: AC005857 is currently called RP4-809F18, but this name belongs to AC007368 (see HG-101). Submitters have confirmed this.
issue.resolution_text: AC005857 removed from the TPF. No replacement needed b/c of 200 bp overlap between AC005227 and AC005226.

issue.summary: Heterozygous region in need of clarification to ensure 60kb indel is included in TPF
issue.description: Heterozygous region in need of clarification to ensure 60kb indel is included in TPF
issue.resolution_text: The TPF has been updated and the swithc points curated to ensure representation of extra 60Kb of data. Red ball joins have been certificated.
